member.name: P:SandcastleBuilder.HtmlExtract.SandcastleHtmlExtract.MaxDegreeOfParallelism
member.summary: This is used to get or set the maximum degree of parallelism used to process the HTML files
member.value: If not set, it defaults to a maximum of 20 threads per processor. Increase or decrease this value as needed based on your system. Setting it to a value less than 1 will allow for an unlimited number of threads. However, this is a largely IO-bound process so allowing an excessive number of threads may slow overall system performance on very large help files.
